title: What is your experience teaching English online? - Quora
tags: Teaching English as a Foreign Language (TEFL)

response.answer_text: I’ve been teaching online for 2 years now.Personally, I like it. It’s much easier than teaching a full classroom.Working from home is always much better. I love the freedom.I choose my own working hours and I don’t have to work if I am not in the mood to. Also, You don’t have to wear formal clothes, drive to work and things like that. I am teaching Chinese kids and they are usually well-behaved and eager to learn. The job itself is not very stressful, which is really important for me. Also, the pay is really good.
